rna.description: Development of web applications. Back End used: PHP, Laravel. Front End used: Bootstrap, JavaScript, Vue 3. Databases with MySQL. Version control with Git. SCRUM methodology through ClickUp.

hoyvoy.description: Development of web applications. Back End used: PHP, Laravel. Front End used: Bootstrap, jQuery, JavaScript, VueJS. Databases with MySQL. Version control with Git – Sourcetree, Tower. Kanban methodology through TeamWork. Constant contact with different internal departments.

bbva.description: Development of the Front End of applications. Front End used: JavaScript and jQuery. Kanban methodology through JIRA. Version control with Git – Sourcetree. Code deployment through Dimensions and Jenkins.

mitsubishi.role: Full Stack Developer - PHP & Software QA
mitsubishi.description: Development of web applications, QA for web and desktop applications. Back End used: PHP. Front End used: HTML, CSS and jQuery. Databases with MySQL. Reporting with Redmine. Kanban methodology with Redmine and Team Foundation Server.

csm.description: Helpdesk, resolution of administrative and technical issues. Installation of operating systems, formatting, repair, upgrading and assembly of computer equipment.

globalHoldings.description: Development of web applications and manual QA. Back End used: PHP. Front End used: HTML, CSS, JavaScript and jQuery. Databases with MySQL.

jesuitesEducacio.description: Development of web applications. Back End used: PHP. Front End used: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, AJAX, JSON and Bootstrap. Databases with MySQL.

informaticaBellvitge.description: Installation of operating systems, formatting, repair, upgrading and assembly of computer equipment. Hardware replacement and resolution of administrative and technical issues.

aboutPage.title: About Me
aboutPage.description: I am a Full Stack Developer specialized in PHP with the Laravel framework and JavaScript with Vue 3. I have 9 years of experience in web and application development. Throughout my career, I have worked on diverse projects that have allowed me to refine my knowledge of back-end and front-end technologies, as well as collaborate closely with multidisciplinary teams.
aboutPage.description2: I am characterized as an organized, detail-oriented, proactive professional with a great ability for self-taught learning when necessary. I enjoy teamwork and contributing innovative and efficient solutions.
aboutPage.description3: I am open to new job opportunities that allow me to continue growing alongside the company and contribute with my technical experience and professional commitment.
